tutorials.title: Welcome to MG space..!
tutorials.description: This is the landing page for my personal space MG.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: MG Library : tell-me-how
tutorials.description: A collection of topics developed from notes on specific areas. These converge from various sources, for example discussions, trainings, experiments, mistakes, and failures. It also lists down the videos and channels on oTube.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Virtual Machines - Real Actions
tutorials.description: How to access VM and configure VNC.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Oracle Database Gold Image
tutorials.description: Pre-installation setup and post installation tasks for Oracle Database gold image. It also discusses the steps to deinstall Oracle Database and some troubleshooting scenarios and tips.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Oracle Enterprise Manager
tutorials.description: How to install Oracle Enterprise Manager on a VM running Linux. It covers installation steps for EM 13.5 2021 image and for RU 14 shiphome. It also contains post installation checks, steps to deinstall EM, and some troubleshooting scenarios and tips.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Into the Clouds
tutorials.description: About the features and services in the OCI Tenancy, for example, noVNC, compute instance, custom images, object storage, compartments, to name a few.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Fun with Git-Bits
tutorials.description: The information in this lab revolves around github, git desktop, git bash, code editors.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Hands down in Markdown
tutorials.description: Using markdown basic formatting and tags.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Linux -:- feed the penguin
tutorials.description: Get hands dirty with Linux commands, tips, and tricks.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Wordlist Check
tutorials.description: A learning tool that checks for disallowed words and incorrect usage in documents according to Oracle's standards and guidelines.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Silly little things
tutorials.description: General concepts, tips, and tricks on anyting and everything.

tutorials.title: Lab #: GitHub PRs
tutorials.description: History of pull and merge requests for DBA Essentials workshops committed to OLL master on Github.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Zoom Barabar Zoom
tutorials.description: Integrate Zoom with Outlook calender and add the plug Zoom for Outlook.

tutorials.title: Lab #: GitHub Markdown emojis
tutorials.description: List of emojis supported by markdown.
